name: express-rescue
description: A wrapper to async route function for expressjs which makes sure all async errors are passed to the next middleware

scripts.coverage: nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text --reporter=text-lcov --show-process-tree --include index.js yarn test && nyc check-coverage --statements 100 --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 yarn test
scripts.lint: standard index.js && standard specs/**.spec.js --global describe --global context --global it --global specify --global before --global after --global beforeEach --global afterEach --global expect

author: Rafael Willians
